name: @saekitominaga/htmlformelement-before-unload-confirm
description: Show confirmation dialog message when page is tries to close while filling out a form.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.js -- brotlin compress dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.js -- terser dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.js -o dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.js.map',filename='FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.js',includeSources,url='FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.d.ts -- cpy dist/FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.d.ts dist --rename=FormBeforeUnloadConfirm.min.d.ts
